case_description: Mrs. Rani filed for divorce alleging cruelty by her husband, Mr. Raj, under Section 13(1)(i-a) of the Hindu Marriage Act, 1955. She claimed repeated verbal abuse, humiliation, and social isolation. Mr. Raj denies allegations and seeks reconciliation.
legal_question: Does repeated psychological abuse qualify as cruelty under Hindu Marriage Act, 1955 for granting divorce?
